Part 5 Roost and nest sites The following map shows the locations where birds spend the night. IMPORTANT Roost = A bird temporarily spending a night at a location but moving frequently Potential nest = A bird returning to the same location through time (across multiple days and weeks) 5.0.1 Nighttime roost movement summary If a birds night-time roost is does not change then the average roost spacing will be very low (<0.5 km - green rows). We should also look at the data where the average roost spacing is <1km (orange rows). All other rows are white: 5.0.1.1 Costa Rica name roost_spacing_km Dizzy 1.1 Pedro 1.1 Clifford 1.2 Ziggy 1.3 Sherekhan 1.5 Flaps 2.5 Frosty 3.3 Elvis 3.8 Dustin 4.4 Messi 5.1 Robinhood 7.2 Spazzino 9.3 Siegfried 9.5 Elizabeth 9.8 Buzzie 10.5 Charles 11.5 Carolina 12.1 Rocky 12.3 Kingkong 13.8 Nekhbet 13.8 Fossey 14.1 Tupac 14.9 Gordon 15.1 Bonnie 16.2 Steve 16.3 Charizard 16.4 Mufasa 16.9 Illari 18.7 Wenceslas 18.7 Moskovits 19.3 You can see the distribution of the nightime locations with the following map.
